name: js-chess
description: Chess frontend showcase using different JavaScript frameworks with go-chess backend API
author: Rumen Damyanov <contact@rumenx.com>

scripts.install:all: npm run install:vue && npm run install:react && npm run install:angular
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:landing" "npm run start:vanilla" "npm run start:vanilla-ts" "npm run start:jquery" "npm run start:vue" "npm run start:react" "npm run start:angular"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:vue && npm run build:react && npm run build:angular
scripts.lint: echo 'Run linting in individual app directories'
scripts.build:styles: sass shared/styles/scss/main.scss shared/styles/scss/dist/common-scss.css --no-source-map && npm run build:app-styles && npm run build:bundles
scripts.build:styles:prod: sass shared/styles/scss/main.scss shared/styles/scss/dist/common-scss.css && sass apps/vanilla-js/scss/bundle.scss:apps/vanilla-js/scss/dist/app-bundle.css && sass apps/vanilla-ts/scss/bundle.scss:apps/vanilla-ts/scss/dist/app-bundle.css && sass apps/jquery/scss/bundle.scss:apps/jquery/scss/dist/app-bundle.css && sass apps/vue-js/src/styles/bundle.scss:apps/vue-js/src/styles/app-bundle.css && postcss shared/styles/scss/dist/common-scss.css -o shared/styles/scss/dist/common-scss.min.css && postcss apps/vanilla-js/scss/dist/app-bundle.css -o apps/vanilla-js/scss/dist/app-bundle.min.css && postcss apps/vanilla-ts/scss/dist/app-bundle.css -o apps/vanilla-ts/scss/dist/app-bundle.min.css && postcss apps/jquery/scss/dist/app-bundle.css -o apps/jquery/scss/dist/app-bundle.min.css && postcss apps/vue-js/src/styles/app-bundle.css -o apps/vue-js/src/styles/app-bundle.min.css
scripts.prestart:vanilla-ts: npm run build:styles && npm run sync:vanilla-ts:css
scripts.test: echo 'Run tests in individual app directories'
scripts.clean: npm run clean:vue && npm run clean:react && npm run clean:angular
